Rainy Days

The main focus for Rainy days was to improve the shopping experience for the user. This means adding a proper "add to cart" function that follows the user through the entire site. They can empty the cart, see what products are in the cart, and the cart gets cleaned out when they have succesfully purchased it.

The menu had some work done because it didn't really make sense anymore considering what the website contains. I cleaned up the html and css based on feedback from tutors and other students.
